doc.title: Traditional Shanghai Chee Cheong Fun Chinatown Complex Temporary Market Part 1 of 5
doc.text: This/DT is/VBZ the/DT first/JJ in/IN a/DT five/CD part/NN series/NN on/IN Chinatown/NNP Complex/NNP Temporary/NNP Market/NNP which/WDT will/MD only/RB relocate/VB back/RB to/TO its/PRP$ original/JJ spot/NN in/IN 2/CD years/NNS time/NN ./. Actually/RB I/PRP found/VBD that/IN the/DT fillings/JJ make/VB little/JJ difference/NN because/IN it/PRP is/VBZ the/DT sweet/JJ sauce/NN that/WDT your/PRP$ really/RB go/VB for/IN ./.
